mean_en: "to bend or turn something into a particular shape; to bend or turn something into a shape or position that is not normal or natural; to be bent or turned in this way; to turn something around in a circle with your hand; to injure part of your body
sentence: Twisting his body is such a easy task for him.
sentence_trans: 扭曲身体对路飞来说是这样容易。
